summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West 74th Street, from 28th Avenue Northwest to 33rd Avenue Northwest; by constructing sewers together with the necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Resolution No. 8607 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
